text: @MattHancock @BorisJohnson Well not ‘together’...rather on the backs of ‘high risk’ heroes, stepping up to the plate to help their fellow citizens to make up for,in part, the gross mismanagement of the #NHS  by successive Tory governments. You useless twunts have cost hundreds of lives.#NHSheroes #COVID19
